message: I propose dividing the money with a 70-30 split in favor of Alice. Let me know if this works for you.
I propose a 60-40 split in my favor. This is a fairer split than the previous offer, considering the upcoming inflation.
I propose an equal division of the money, 500000 for Alice and 500000 for Bob. This ensures fairness and avoids potential issues with inflation affecting the value of our shares.
